docs.text:
https://kyleu.com/projectile
https://github.com/KyleU/projectile
It makes projects. More details soon.
Projectile relies on a whole lot of tremendous open source projects. Here’s a few of them.
docs.title: Projectile

docs.text:
The code is licensed under CC0-1.0.
You can basically do whatever you want with the code, no attribution required. Make it your own!
docs.title: License

docs.text:
SBT
$ cd projectile
$ sbt
> run
$ open http://127.0.0.1:20000
The project is built on Scala and SBT, and can be opened by IntelliJ directly
docs.title: Prerequisites

docs.text: projectile The Play web application that provides a UI for management projectile-export Performs parsing of inputs and code generation of projects projectile-sbt Allows you to call Projectile from within sbt doc The project containing this documentation
docs.title: Projects

docs.text:
Projectile generates code. More details soon.
API Documentation
Database Thrift GraphQL SBT Plugin
docs.title: Code Generation

docs.text: Codegen for PostgreSQL databases! Docs soon
docs.title: Database

docs.text: Codegen for Thrift IDL! Docs soon
docs.title: Thrift

docs.text: Codegen for GraphQL queries and mutations! Docs soon
docs.title: GraphQL

docs.text: There’s a plugin too! Docs soon
docs.title: SBT Plugin

docs.text:
Projectile generates Scala code that expects helper classes to be available.
You can provide your own, or use the Projectile libraries. You almost certainly won’t need them all, but documentation on the exposed classes is available here.
Scala Tracing JDBC Slick Doobie Thrift GraphQL Service Scala.js Play Auth
docs.title: Scala Libraries

docs.text: Common classes relating to core models and utilities (API Documentation)
docs.title: Scala

docs.text:
sbt libraryDependencies += "com.kyleu" %% "projectile-lib-scala" % "latest" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>com.kyleu</groupId>
  <artifactId>projectile-lib-scala_2.12</artifactId>
  <version>latest</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'com.kyleu', name: 'projectile-lib-scala_2.12', version: 'latest'
}
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: Wrapper case class used for search results
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.models.result.BaseResult

docs.text: A simple key and value case class, used where unordered maps aren’t appropriate
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.models.tag.Tag

docs.text: Provides ordering, formatting, and common utilities for Local and Zoned java.time date classes
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.DateUtils

docs.text: Uses a user-provided secret to encrypt and decrypt arbitrary bytes and strings using AES/ECB/PKCS5Padding
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.EncryptionUtils

docs.text: A JSON parser that supports comments and included external files
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.JsonIncludeParser

docs.text: Provides all the imports and utility methods you need to work with Circe using dates, uuids, enums and sealed traits
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.JsonSerializers

docs.text: Provides a logging interface that accepts TraceData in its methods and includes the trace ids in its output
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.Logging

docs.text: Rather than use null references in your code, NullUtils is provided for common operations and values involving nulls
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.NullUtils

docs.text: Currently only provides a cross-platform method for formatting numbers
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.NumberUtils

docs.text: Exposes a method to split a string to an ordered sequence of lines
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.StringUtils

docs.text: Utility methods to transform a java.util.UUID to and from a sequence of bytes
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.UuidUtils

docs.text: Used everywhere, TraceData is a common trait that exposes authentication and tracing information for OpenTracing services
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.tracing.TraceData

docs.text: Provides tracing helpers and methods to wrap access to OpenTracing
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.tracing.TraceService

docs.text: Helper classes for OpenTracing and Micrometer (API Documentation)
docs.title: Tracing

docs.text:
sbt libraryDependencies += "com.kyleu" %% "projectile-lib-tracing" % "latest" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>com.kyleu</groupId>
  <artifactId>projectile-lib-tracing_2.12</artifactId>
  <version>latest</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'com.kyleu', name: 'projectile-lib-tracing_2.12', version: 'latest'
}
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: Helper class to initialize Prometheus, Datadog, or StatsD metrics reporting
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.metrics.Instrumented

docs.text: Case class containing all of the information needed to report metrics. Usually created from a config file.
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.metrics.MetricsConfig

docs.text: Implements TracingService to provide system-wide tracing support
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.tracing.OpenTracingService

docs.text: Extends TraceData with OpenTracing-specific functionality
docs.title: com.kyleu.projectile.util.tracing.TraceDataOpenTracing

docs.text: Imports and models for jdbc database connections (API Documentation)
docs.title: JDBC

docs.text:
sbt libraryDependencies += "com.kyleu" %% "projectile-lib-jdbc" % "latest" Maven <dependency>

  <artifactId>projectile-lib-jdbc_2.12</artifactId>
  <version>latest</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {

}

docs.text:
A GraphQL schema is provided, accessible in the administration section.
Projectile relies on a whole lot of tremendous open source projects. Here’s a few of them.
Scala Play Framework Akka Sangria Materialize CSS Enumeratum circe Font Awesome JQuery
